title: The Bachelor Franchise : Manipulation at its Finest
itunes:title: The Bachelor Franchise : Manipulation at its Finest
itunes:subtitle: Do ugly engagement rings = doomed relationships?
description:
Ever wondered why some are crazier than others on the bachelor franchise? Join us as we talk about Katie’s season (in particular about Gregg Grippo), diving deep into some of the interesting science behind attachment styles (anxious, avoidant, and secure) and how the show does a good job of exacerbating insecurities and activating “crazy”.


We even talk previous season, Chris Harrison's sudden departure, and what being there for "the right reason" really means *HEAVY eye roll from Madz*


Don't forget to follow us and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
